name: Head North (SquishypuffDave)
description:
Keep your eyes on the horizon. You don't want to see what's behind you.

Submission to Neophyte Studios' Narrative Game Jam #4

Note: Unfortunately I didn't get around to adding a "start again" button, but the game is designed to reward multiple playthroughs. It may be easier to open this page in a new tab, and reopen it again for each playthrough.
